entry.title: RAINFALL WARNING ENDED, Nain
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:09 AM AST Monday 06 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Drizzle, 1.6°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Nain Airport 05:26 AM AST Monday 06 March 2023
Condition: Light Drizzle
Temperature: 1.6°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.5 kPa rising
Visibility: 2.4 km
Humidity: 98 %
Dewpoint: 1.3°C
Wind: NE 45 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Monday: Periods of rain or drizzle. Temperature steady near plus 1.
